QR & Barcode Generator Extension for Chrome
Easily generate QR codes and barcodes right from your browser! Whether you're working with text, images, links, or barcodes, this extension simplifies the process in a few clicks.

Key Features:

Text QR Codes: Convert any piece of text into a scannable QR code for quick sharing.
Image QR Codes: Turn your images into QR codes effortlessly.
Link QR Codes: Instantly generate QR codes for URLs, perfect for sharing websites or files.
Barcodes: Create professional-grade barcodes to meet your business needs.
Whether you’re sharing information, boosting productivity, or managing digital assets, our tool is designed for speed and simplicity. Perfect for professionals, educators, and anyone who frequently uses QR codes or barcodes.
